channel.title: *I'm a No0b* Can somebody give me a TuT on making an npc saying what u want?
channel.description: i just started getting good at coding and this is the only thing i didn't figure out yet if you can help it would be nice... for me :)

item.title: *I'm a No0b* Can somebody give me a TuT on making an npc saying what u want?
item.dc:creator: @openice123 openice123
item.description:
@openice123 wrote:

well im alittle nicer ill walk ya thro

ok to make it say your the owner search for moo in npc handler

else if (npcs[i].npcType == the npc id) { if (misc.random2(10) <= 3) //this is the time delay { npcs[i].updateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true; if (PlayerHandler.isPlayerOn("your name")) { npcs[i].textUpdate = "owner your name is ONLINE"; } else { npcs[i].textUpdate = "owner your name is OFFLINE"; } } }

heres to say what pretty much what ever

if (npcs[i].npcType == npc id) { if (misc.random2(30) == 1) { npcs[i].updateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdate = "what ya wana say!"; } }

Read full topic
item.source: *I'm a No0b* Can somebody give me a TuT on making an npc saying what u want?

item.title: *I'm a No0b* Can somebody give me a TuT on making an npc saying what u want?
item.dc:creator: @P_16 P 16
item.description:
@P_16 wrote:

hi dum dum

im gonna tell u one step! u figure out the rest

if (npcs[i].npcType == 2862) { if (misc.random2(25) == 1) { npcs[i].updateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdate = ("Go though the portal and get out of my site!"); } }

post that in npc handler figure out how u change the npc type, where to put it, and how to change the wrighting
